tabs.content: Britannia Fudge It Chocolate Brownie Cake is in town. With a delectable, mouth-watering taste, it is going to win your heart and be your new dessert buddy. Filled with the goodness of wheat, eggs, milk, and soya, the brownie cake deliciously melts in your mouth. This soft, spongy, and fluffy brownie cake will definitely make you say 'One more!' Believing in delivering fresh and healthy products, Britannia India manufactures some of India's favourite cakes.
tabs.title: About the Product

tabs.content: Enjoy the delicious and mouth-watering flavours in every slice of ready to eat Britannia Cakes.
